languages.text: {n}Владайм хищно улыбается.{/n} "Опасные слова, весьма опасные. Но сильные. Не сомневаюсь, что вы подкрепите их делом".

traits.locale_text: {n}Владайм хищно улыбается.{/n} "Опасные слова, весьма опасные. Но сильные. Не сомневаюсь, что вы подкрепите их делом".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym grins wickedly.{/n} "Dangerous words. Very dangerous. But powerful. I have no doubt you'll match them with your actions."

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆露出了邪恶的笑容。{/n}“这些话很危险，非常危险，但充满了力量。我毫不怀疑，您会以行动来证明这一点。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grins wickedly.{/n} "Dangerous words. Very dangerous. But powerful. I have no doubt you'll match them with your actions."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆露出了邪恶的笑容。{/n}“这些话很危险，非常危险，但充满了力量。我毫不怀疑，您会以行动来证明这一点。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは悪い笑顔を浮かべた。{/n}「危険な言葉だ。非常に危険だ。だが、力強い。きっとあなたなら、言った通りの行動ができるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grins wickedly.{/n} "Dangerous words. Very dangerous. But powerful. I have no doubt you'll match them with your actions."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは悪い笑顔を浮かべた。{/n}「危険な言葉だ。非常に危険だ。だが、力強い。きっとあなたなら、言った通りの行動ができるだろう」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym sonríe con malicia.{/n} «Palabras peligrosas. Muy peligrosas. Pero poderosas. No dudo que las igualará con sus acciones».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grins wickedly.{/n} "Dangerous words. Very dangerous. But powerful. I have no doubt you'll match them with your actions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym sonríe con malicia.{/n} «Palabras peligrosas. Muy peligrosas. Pero poderosas. No dudo que las igualará con sus acciones».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym grinst böse.{/n} "Gefährliche Worte. Sehr gefährlich. Aber mächtig. Ich habe keinen Zweifel, dass Ihr auch entsprechende Taten folgen lassen werdet."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grins wickedly.{/n} "Dangerous words. Very dangerous. But powerful. I have no doubt you'll match them with your actions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym grinst böse.{/n} "Gefährliche Worte. Sehr gefährlich. Aber mächtig. Ich habe keinen Zweifel, dass Ihr auch entsprechende Taten folgen lassen werdet."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym sourit d'un air mauvais.{/n} « Voilà de dangereuses, très dangereuses paroles. Mais elles sont puissantes et je ne doute pas que vous les concrétiserez par vos actes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grins wickedly.{/n} "Dangerous words. Very dangerous. But powerful. I have no doubt you'll match them with your actions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym sourit d'un air mauvais.{/n} « Voilà de dangereuses, très dangereuses paroles. Mais elles sont puissantes et je ne doute pas que vous les concrétiserez par vos actes. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym pis pis gülüyor.{/n} "Tehlikeli sözler. Hem de çok. Fakat kudretli de. Sözlerinizi boşa çıkarmayacağınızdan şüphem yok."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grins wickedly.{/n} "Dangerous words. Very dangerous. But powerful. I have no doubt you'll match them with your actions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym pis pis gülüyor.{/n} "Tehlikeli sözler. Hem de çok. Ama kudretli de. Sözlerinizi boşa çıkarmayacağınızdan şüphem yok."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
